mapper.select: select m.id as id, m.contact_mobile as contactMobile, m.member_code as memberCode, m.status as status, m.mall_account as mallAccount, m.contact_name as contactName, mc.location_province as locationProvince, mc.location_city as locationCity, mc.location_county as locationCounty, mc.location_town as locationTown, mc.location_detail as locationDetail, mc.location_addr as locationAddr, mc.company_code as companyCode, mc.company_name as companyName, m.regist_time as registTime, mc.artificial_person_name as artificialPersonName, mc.artificial_person_mobile as artificialPersonMobile, mc.buyer_seller_type as buyerSellerType, m.account_type as accountType, m.is_buyer as isBuyer, m.is_seller as isSeller, m.can_mall_login as canMallLogin from member_base_info m left join member_company_info mc on m.id=mc.member_id where m.belong_manager_id=#{managerCode} and mc.buyer_seller_type='2' and exists(select member_id from member_status_info ms where ms.member_id=m.id and ms.info_type='11') order by m.create_time desc,m.id limit #{pager.pageOffset},#{pager.rows}

select count(m.id) from member_base_info m left join member_company_info mc on m.id=mc.member_id where m.belong_manager_id=#{managerCode} and mc.buyer_seller_type='2' and exists(select member_id from member_status_info ms where ms.member_id=m.id and ms.info_type='11')
